Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

::Cygnar::
       "Eh, yes yes.  I'm quite ready."  He nods graciously and smiles.  
"What I have to say is really quite simple, although you may not like it just 
because I'm asking."  He shrugs and begins pacing the room.  "First of all, 
you must understand that Lord Galvatron wishes you dead, and he will never 
cease to attempt to destroy you.  That said, he, at my advisement, wishes to 
postpone said destruction in favor of more," He pauses as if searching for 
the right word, "constructive pursuits.  But I digress."  He sighs and stops 
pacing to look at Rodimus Prime.  "In the near future there will be a battle 
between the Predacons and the Tripredacus faction.  All I need from you is 
your word that the Maximals will not interfere in that battle.  It's really 
not that much to ask, for you to not risk your own troops in a battle that 
has no affect on you, now is it?"  He smiles again.

--part1_76.207afae7.2a8485fb_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
